root.name: Bega's Battle
root.description: An early 1983 laserdisc video game by Nihon Bussan and Data East, based on the anime film Harmagedon, featuring character designs by Katsuhiro Otomo (of Akira fame), released earlier that year. It was a shoot 'em up that featured cinematic anime FMV cutscenes between the shooting stages, along with a branching storyline.
